ModMetadata.Name: SEGI - Sonic Ether Globall Illumination
ModMetadata.Author: Erdroy
ModMetadata.Description:
WARNING: This mod will not work, unless you install Stationeers.Addon mod loader. Read how to install it here: https://github.com/Erdroy/Stationeers.Addons ---
This mod adds experimental fully-dynamic voxel-based global illumination to the game. It is more likely just an experiment with our Stationers.Addons framework. Requires pretty beefy PC to run it.
Press F11 for more configuration.
